Keywords: We should stay away from the gang of soldiers (Vater
bleiben wir von dem Soldatenhaufen) for the illustrated book Wallensteins Lager (Wallenstein's Camp)
Title: Father, this won't turn out well. We should stay away from the gang of soldiers (Vater, es wird nicht gut ablaufen, bleiben wir von dem Soldatenhaufen) for the illustrated book Wallensteins Lager (Wallenstein's Camp)
